text.tspan: Death rate from PM2.5 vs PM2.5 concentration, by country, 2015
Age-standardized death rate from particular matter (PM2.5) exposure per 100,000 people vs. average PM2.5
Death rate from ambient PM2.5 air pollution- State of Global Air
Note: The size of each country's bubble is a reflection of its average GDP per capita (Real GDP at chained PPPs in 2011US$ prices). Bubbles are
